data.insert: Ever dreamed of living in a house

? Now you can build your own edible abode, perfect for satisfying both your housing and snacking needs.

Scientific Basis
Chocolate can be a surprisingly sturdy building material
to make it stronger and gives it a higher melting point than regular chocolate. Using thick,

, insulated with a layer of sugar foam, can create walls that are both tasty and thermally resistant.

Example Construction Plan
: A thick layer of chocolate nougat for stability and shock absorption.
: Double-layered dark chocolate bricks with white chocolate mortar.

: Shingles made of hardened milk chocolate for easy repairs... and nibbles.

Keep your home cool with air conditioning to prevent it from turning into hot chocolate. Also, during Easter, your house becomes the ultimate egg hunt prize!
